abilities.description: Drains 1% of all stats from raid every 2 sec for 8 sec. HANDLING: Cannot prevent. He gains the stats. Minor issue.

abilities.name: Siphon Soul
abilities.description: Steals abilities from random raid member's CLASS. Gains 2-3 abilities from that class. HANDLING: Varies by class stolen. See below.

abilities.name: Stolen: Paladin
abilities.description: Gains Consecration (move boss out), Avenging Wrath (increased damage).

abilities.name: Stolen: Mage
abilities.description: Gains Frost Nova (frozen in place), Frostbolt (interruptible).

abilities.name: Stolen: Warrior
abilities.description: Gains Whirlwind (melee run out), Spell Reflection (stop casting).

abilities.name: Stolen: Warlock
abilities.description: Gains Corruption (dispel), Rain of Fire (move out).

abilities.name: Stolen: Priest
abilities.description: Gains Psychic Scream (fear - tremor/ward), Mind Control (CC the MC'd player).

abilities.name: Stolen: Shaman
abilities.description: Gains Fire Nova Totem (kill totem), Healing Wave (interrupt).

abilities.name: Stolen: Hunter
abilities.description: Gains Freezing Trap (dispel), Snake Trap (AoE snakes).

abilities.name: Stolen: Druid
abilities.description: Gains Lifebloom (purge/interrupt), Thorns (minor damage).

abilities.name: Stolen: Rogue
abilities.description: Gains Blind (dispel), Slice and Dice (increased speed).

bosses.strategy: KILL 4 ADDS FIRST. Each add has different abilities - CC or burn. Once adds dead, focus Malacrass. Watch for Siphon Soul - he announces which class. React to stolen abilities (interrupt heals, dispel CC, move from AoE). Stack for Spirit Bolts healing. Knowing class abilities helps predict his moves.

bosses.name: Zul'jin
bosses.description: FINAL BOSS. Warlord Zul'jin cycles through 5 animal forms at 80/60/40/20% HP: Troll > Bear > Eagle > Lynx > Dragonhawk. Each form has unique lethal mechanic.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw (Troll)
abilities.description: TROLL (100-80%): Bleed on random player dealing 2.5k/2 sec until healed to full. HANDLING: HEAL TARGET TO 100% HP to remove bleed. If not topped = bleeds to death.

abilities.name: Whirlwind (Troll)
abilities.description: TROLL: Spins dealing 3-4k damage to melee. HANDLING: Melee run out during Whirlwind.

abilities.name: Creeping Paralysis (Bear)
abilities.description: BEAR (80-60%): Stacking debuff slowing movement/attack by 20% per stack, roots at 5 stacks. HANDLING: DISPEL before 5 stacks. If rooted during bear charge = dead. Cleanse/Abolish constantly.

abilities.name: Overpower (Bear)
abilities.description: BEAR: Heavy physical hit after dodged attack. HANDLING: Tank doesn't dodge (stance dance to Berserker if warrior).

abilities.name: Energy Storm (Eagle)
abilities.description: EAGLE (60-40%): Zul'jin floats and creates electric vortex. Every time ANYONE casts a spell, entire raid takes 1.2k nature damage. HANDLING: STOP CASTING. No heals (use bandages), no DPS spells. Melee white damage only. Hunters can shoot. Most wipe-causing phase.

abilities.name: Claw Rage (Lynx)
abilities.description: LYNX (40-20%): Fixates random player, attacks them rapidly for 8k+ damage over duration. HANDLING: Spam heal the fixated target. They can't kite - just survive through healing.

abilities.name: Lynx Rush (Lynx)
abilities.description: LYNX: Charges random player. HANDLING: Spread loosely. Heal charge targets.

abilities.name: Flame Whirl (Dragonhawk)
abilities.description: DRAGONHAWK (20-0%): Fire columns spiral outward from Zul'jin. HANDLING: Move between columns. Don't get hit.

abilities.name: Flame Breath (Dragonhawk)
abilities.description: DRAGONHAWK: Frontal cone fire. HANDLING: Don't stand in front of boss.

abilities.name: Pillar of Fire (Dragonhawk)
abilities.description: DRAGONHAWK: Fire falls on random players. HANDLING: Move out of fire. Burn boss fast - room gets covered.

bosses.strategy: TROLL: Heal Grievous Throw targets to full. Melee avoid Whirlwind. BEAR: Dispel Creeping Paralysis constantly. Don't let anyone hit 5 stacks. EAGLE: STOP ALL CASTING. Melee auto-attack. Hunters shoot. No heals unless someone will die. LYNX: Spam heal Claw Rage target. DRAGONHAWK: Avoid fire, burn boss. This is the ZA skill check - Eagle phase wipes most groups.

bosses.name: Kalecgos
bosses.description: Blue dragon corrupted by the demon Sathrovarr. Unique two-realm encounter requiring coordination between dragon and demon realm groups.

abilities.name: Arcane Buffet
abilities.description: Stacks arcane damage debuff every 8 seconds in dragon realm. Each stack increases arcane damage taken by 500. HANDLING: Portal to demon realm before reaching 10+ stacks. Coordinate rotations so you portal before stacks become lethal. Track your stacks carefully.

abilities.name: Frost Breath
abilities.description: Frontal cone dealing 7,000-9,000 Frost damage. HANDLING: Only tanks in front of Kalecgos. Ranged and healers position to sides or behind. Tank faces dragon away from raid.

abilities.name: Spectral Blast
abilities.description: Creates portal sending nearby players to demon realm. Targets random player, teleporting them and anyone within 6 yards. HANDLING: Spread loosely (6+ yards apart) to control who goes through portal. Only 1-2 people should enter per portal. Coordinate portal entries with Arcane Buffet stacks.

abilities.name: Corruption: Horror
abilities.description: Sathrovarr fears all players in demon realm for 4 seconds. HANDLING: Tremor Totem, Fear Ward on tank. Maintain high HP before fear in case of positioning issues. Healers prepare for chaotic movement after fear.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: Sathrovarr hits all players in demon realm for 3,000-4,000 Shadow damage. HANDLING: Keep demon realm group healed. Shadow resist gear can help reduce damage. Cannot be interrupted - just heal through it.

abilities.name: Curse of Boundless Agony
abilities.description: Debuff dealing increasing shadow damage every 2 seconds. Damage doubles each tick. HANDLING: Decurse IMMEDIATELY - this is top priority. Mages/Druids must have decurse on easy keybind. Unremoved curse will kill players quickly.

bosses.strategy: TWO-REALM COORDINATION: Raid splits between dragon realm (fighting Kalecgos) and demon realm (fighting Sathrovarr). Use portals to rotate when Arcane Buffet stacks high. CRITICAL: Both Kalecgos and Sathrovarr must die within 10 seconds of each other or they heal to full. Keep damage even on both - use raid marks or DBM to track both health pools. Organize 3 groups rotating through portals systematically.

bosses.name: Brutallus
bosses.description: Pure DPS race with extremely tight 6-minute enrage timer. Requires approximately 22,000 raid DPS. Often considered the 'gear check' boss of Sunwell.

abilities.name: Meteor Slash
abilities.description: Deals massive physical damage split among all targets in front of Brutallus (approx 20,000 damage divided). Also applies debuff increasing Fire damage taken by 75% for 12 seconds. HANDLING: ENTIRE RAID except current tank stacks in front. More people = less damage per person. With Burn debuff, DO NOT stand in Meteor Slash group until debuff fades.

abilities.name: Burn
abilities.description: Places fire DoT on random player dealing 3,000 Fire damage every 2 seconds for 60 seconds. Spreads to nearby players within 2 yards. Combined with Meteor Slash debuff = lethal damage. HANDLING: If you get Burn, RUN OUT OF MELEE immediately to designated Burn spot. Stay away from ALL players. The DoT ticks hard, especially with Fire damage debuff - healers assign dedicated Burn healers.

abilities.name: Stomp
abilities.description: AoE knockback dealing 8,000-10,000 physical damage to current target and nearby players. 10-yard range. HANDLING: Only tanks and melee should be in Stomp range. Healers must be ready for spike damage on tanks. Use cooldowns if low health when Stomp incoming.

bosses.strategy: PURE DPS RACE: Need ~22,000 raid DPS to beat 6-minute enrage. Everyone stacks in front for Meteor Slash EXCEPT: Burn targets run out, off-tank stays behind. TANK ROTATION: Taunt swap after each Meteor Slash because of fire damage debuff. Burn management is key - designated Burn spots on left and right, affected players immediately relocate. NO room for deaths - every DPS matters for timer. Use Heroism/Bloodlust early and again if Drums available.

bosses.name: Felmyst
bosses.description: Reanimated corpse of the blue dragon Madrigosa. Alternates between ground and air phases. Tight DPS requirements with punishing mechanics.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Hits tank and nearby targets for 8,000-10,000 physical damage. HANDLING: Only tanks in front of boss. Melee position at rear legs or flanks, never directly in front.

abilities.name: Corrosion
abilities.description: Stacking debuff reducing tank's armor by 10% per stack. Lasts 10 seconds, stacks quickly. HANDLING: Tank swap at 5-6 stacks or when comfortable. Tanks must communicate. Off-tank taunts, debuffed tank backs off until stacks drop.

abilities.name: Gas Nova
abilities.description: Raid-wide AoE dealing 2,500 Shadow damage to everyone plus silencing for 1 second. HANDLING: Healers anticipate and pre-heal. Shadow resist helps. Keep raid topped before Gas Nova. Silence interrupts heals so stay healthy.

abilities.name: Encapsulate
abilities.description: Encases random player in demonic energy, stunning them and dealing 3,500 Shadow damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds. Also damages nearby players. HANDLING: If encapsulated, you can't do anything. Nearby players move away. Healers keep Encapsulate target alive. Ranged stay loosely spread to minimize splash.

abilities.name: Demonic Vapor
abilities.description: AIR PHASE: Felmyst breathes green beam in a line across the platform. Anyone hit takes 2,000 damage/second and spawns Unyielding Dead skeletons. HANDLING: Watch where beam starts, run perpendicular to its path. Pre-position near edges to have escape room. Skeletons must be picked up and killed quickly - they cast Fog of Corruption.

abilities.name: Fog of Corruption
abilities.description: AIR PHASE: Green fog clouds spawning from skeletons. Anyone touching fog is instantly mind controlled permanently (until killed). MC'd players buff nearby enemies. HANDLING: ABSOLUTE PRIORITY - never touch fog. Watch for fog spawn locations and adjust position. Kill skeletons fast to minimize fog. If someone is MC'd, they must be killed and battle-rezzed.

bosses.strategy: GROUND PHASE: Tank and spank with Corrosion tank swaps. Spread for Encapsulate. DPS hard - air phase is recovery time. AIR PHASE: Position at edges of platform. Watch breath direction and RUN perpendicular. Kill skeletons IMMEDIATELY before they spawn fog. FOG = WIPE if multiple people MC'd. Three breath passes per air phase. After 3rd breath, reposition for ground phase. Felmyst always lands same spot - tanks ready.

bosses.name: Eredar Twins
bosses.description: Grand Warlock Alythess (fire) and Lady Sacrolash (shadow). Must be tanked apart while managing touch debuffs that are removed by opposite school of damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Nova
abilities.description: Sacrolash casts AoE dealing 3,000-4,000 Shadow damage to all players within 20 yards. 2-second cast. HANDLING: Melee on Sacrolash must run out during cast. Ranged stay at max range. Interruptible but on short cooldown so cannot rely on kicks alone.

abilities.name: Confounding Blow
abilities.description: Sacrolash stuns tank for 2 seconds and knocks back. Resets threat on main target. HANDLING: Off-tank must taunt immediately. Main tank regains threat when stun fades. Tanks coordinate positioning so knockback doesn't push into raid.

abilities.name: Shadow Blades
abilities.description: Sacrolash throws shadow blades at random player, dealing 1,500 Shadow damage. Applies Dark Touched. HANDLING: Cannot avoid - just heal through damage. Important for managing Dark Touched stacks. Shadow resist can help.

abilities.name: Dark Touched
abilities.description: Stacking shadow debuff from Sacrolash abilities. At 5+ stacks, player explodes dealing massive Shadow damage to nearby allies. HANDLING: Stand near Alythess (fire twin) to get hit by her fire abilities - Fire damage REMOVES Dark Touched stacks. Never let stacks reach 5.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Alythess spawns fire patch on ground dealing 3,000 Fire damage per second. Persists for 1 minute. HANDLING: Move out of fire immediately. Tank repositions Alythess to clear space. Fire patches can fill room if not managed.

abilities.name: Flame Sear
abilities.description: Alythess deals fire AoE to 3 random targets and anyone within 10 yards. HANDLING: Spread at least 10 yards when fighting Alythess. Removes Dark Touched stacks - intentionally position to get hit if you have stacks.

abilities.name: Fire Touched
abilities.description: Stacking fire debuff from Alythess abilities. At 5+ stacks, player explodes dealing massive Fire damage to nearby allies. HANDLING: Move near Sacrolash (shadow twin) to get hit by Shadow Blades - removes Fire Touched stacks. Constantly swap positions based on your stacks.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Alythess sets random player on fire for 3,000 Fire damage per second and damages nearby players. HANDLING: Conflag target RUN AWAY from raid immediately. Other players spread away from Conflag target. Dispel does not remove it - just survive duration.

bosses.strategy: POSITIONING: Tank twins on opposite ends of room (40+ yards apart). Raid splits into two groups. TOUCH MECHANIC: If you have Dark Touched stacks, move to fire side to cleanse. If you have Fire Touched stacks, move to shadow side to cleanse. Never let either stack reach 5. DPS BALANCE: Keep health pools within 3% of each other - at 20% HP they start buffing each other. Stop DPS on low twin, push high twin to match. Kill simultaneously or surviving twin enrages.

bosses.name: M'uru
bosses.description: Corrupted Naaru transforming into void god Entropius at 0% HP. Considered one of the hardest TBC encounters due to extremely healing-intensive add management.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.description: PHASE 1: Raid-wide pulse dealing 3,000 Shadow damage every 3 seconds. Constant throughout P1. HANDLING: Healers must constantly AoE heal raid. Shadow protection helps. No way to avoid - just heal through it. Mana management critical.

abilities.name: Negative Energy
abilities.description: M'uru casts constant AoE shadow damage around himself. HANDLING: Only tanks should be in melee range of M'uru. Everyone else stays at range. Melee DPS focus adds instead of boss.

abilities.name: Summon Blood Elf
abilities.description: Every 30 seconds, 6 Sunblade Sentinels spawn - 2 Warriors, 2 Mages, 2 Warlocks. Warriors charge random targets. Mages cast Arcane Explosion. Warlocks apply DoTs. HANDLING: AOE CC immediately - Frost Nova, stuns, fears. Warriors charge so ranged/healers stay grouped for quick pickup. Kill Warlocks first (DoTs are deadly), then Mages, then Warriors. Mages counterspell Mage casts.

abilities.name: Summon Void Sentinel
abilities.description: Every 30 seconds, Void Sentinel spawns from portal. High HP, hits hard, casts Shadow Pulse (AoE) and summons 8 Void Spawn on death. HANDLING: Tank Sentinel away from raid. DPS focus it down. When it dies, be ready to AoE the 8 Void Spawns immediately. Void Spawns cast Shadow Bolt Volley - must die fast.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: PHASE 2 (Entropius): Creates void zones that pull players toward center. Standing in center = instant death. HANDLING: Run against the pull immediately. Position away from Black Holes. They expand over time. Use movement abilities (Blink, Sprint) to escape pull if needed.

abilities.name: Singularity
abilities.description: PHASE 2: Spawns Dark Fiends that fixate on random players. If they reach target, massive shadow damage. HANDLING: Kite Dark Fiends, don't let them touch you. Kill them with ranged DPS while kiting. Snares help significantly. They despawn after short time if not killed.

abilities.name: Negative Energy (Entropius)
abilities.description: PHASE 2: Entropius pulses massive shadow AoE every 2 seconds for 5,000+ damage to everyone. HANDLING: This is why P2 is a burn phase. Healers spam AoE heals. Everyone uses healthstones, pots. Boss must die before healers OOM.

bosses.strategy: PHASE 1: Control adds while slowly killing M'uru. Kill order: Sentinels  Warlocks  Mages  Warriors  Void Sentinels  Void Spawns. Timing is everything - new adds spawn every 30 sec. Warlocks MUST die in first fear. Void Sentinels tanked away; AoE Void Spawns when Sentinel dies. PHASE 2 (at 0% M'uru): BURN ENTROPIUS FAST. This is a healing race. Everyone uses cooldowns, pots, healthstones. Avoid Black Holes, kill Dark Fiends. Boss has ~1.5M HP in P2 - must die before healers OOM from constant raid damage. HEROISM IN P2.

bosses.name: Kil'jaeden
bosses.description: The Deceiver. Final boss of TBC emerging from Sunwell portal. Five-phase encounter utilizing Dragon Orbs for survival mechanics. Most complex fight in TBC.

abilities.name: Soul Flay
abilities.description: Main tank attack dealing 3,000 Shadow damage and applying debuff increasing Shadow damage taken. HANDLING: Tank uses Shadow resist gear. Healers keep tank topped. Shadow protection buffs help significantly. Standard tank healing rotation.

abilities.name: Legion Lightning
abilities.description: Chain lightning hitting initial target for 3,000 Arcane damage, jumping to nearby players with increasing damage per jump. HANDLING: SPREAD OUT - 10+ yards apart. If lightning starts jumping through stacked players, damage escalates quickly and causes wipes. Ranged and healers maintain spacing.

abilities.name: Fire Bloom
abilities.description: Hits 5 random players with fire DoT dealing 2,500 Fire damage every 2 seconds for 20 seconds. HANDLING: Cannot be avoided. Healers keep Fire Bloom targets alive. Fire resist can help but usually just heal through it. Players with Fire Bloom stay spread to avoid Legion Lightning stacking.

abilities.name: Sinister Reflection
abilities.description: Creates shadowy copies of 4 random players. Copies have player abilities and can heal, DPS, or cast CC. HANDLING: Kill reflections IMMEDIATELY. They cast real spells - healer copies heal, mage copies sheep. CC them if possible (stuns, fears). Focus fire one at a time. Usually spawn during phase transitions.

abilities.name: Shadow Spike
abilities.description: Targets random player with shadow damage spike. HANDLING: Cannot be avoided. Healers watch for Shadow Spike targets. Less dangerous than other abilities but contributes to overall damage pressure.

abilities.name: Flame Dart
abilities.description: Fire projectiles shot at random raid members during later phases. HANDLING: Keep raid healthy. Fire resist can help. Another source of unavoidable damage requiring constant healing.

abilities.name: Darkness of a Thousand Souls
abilities.description: PHASE 3+: 8-second cast dealing 50,000 Shadow damage to entire raid. WIPE MECHANIC if not handled. Cast multiple times in later phases. HANDLING: USE DRAGON ORBS when cast starts. Orbs create Shield of the Blue protecting from Darkness damage. One player activates orb, everyone stacks in shield. CRITICAL: Orbs have limited uses (4 orbs, ~3 uses each). Plan orb usage for later phases.

abilities.name: Armageddon
abilities.description: PHASE 4-5: Meteors fall from sky targeting random locations. 10,000 Fire damage on impact plus fire DoT in area. Multiple meteors per wave. HANDLING: WATCH THE SKY - red circles indicate impact zones. Move out of impact zones immediately. Keep moving during Armageddon phases. Healers top raid before meteor waves.

abilities.name: Sacrifice of Anveena
abilities.description: At 25% HP, Anveena sacrifices herself giving raid massive damage buff. Begins final burn phase. HANDLING: Save cooldowns and Heroism for this phase. Burn KJ as fast as possible. Darkness casts continue so still need orb shields.

bosses.strategy: 5 PHASES - Mechanics layer on progressively. P1 (100-85%): Basic tank and spank, spread for Legion Lightning. P2 (85-55%): Add Sinister Reflections - kill immediately. Add Shield Orbs - destroy before they reach KJ. P3 (55-25%): DARKNESS begins - assign orb clickers, stack in shields. Flame Darts add pressure. P4 (25%+): Armageddon meteors - constant movement while handling Darkness. Anveena buffs damage. FINAL BURN: All cooldowns, Heroism. Orbs may run out - need to kill KJ before next Darkness. POSITIONING: Spread 10 yards for Lightning, but be ready to stack for Darkness shields. Tanks use shadow resist. Sinister Reflections are top kill priority whenever they spawn.
